pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:7.2: “Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:9.6: parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati,
